Member Function Documentation

void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::SBWListener::onModuleShutdown (  Integer    x )  [inline, virtual]
 

Called when a given module disconnects from the broker.

This implementation calls onModuleShutdown(Module x).

See also:
onModuleShutdown(Module x)
Parameters:
x  ignored; numeric module instance identifier of module instance that has disconnected from the broker.

Implements SystemsBiologyWorkbench::SBWRPCListener.
